posts.title: Makita Power Tool Battery Coffee Maker
posts.content: Enjoying a hot cup of Joe while on the jobsite has never been easier thanks to the Makita power tool battery coffee maker. Available in two distinct colors, this rugged cordless appliance can be powered by the same lithium ion battery packs that connect to your power tools.

posts.title: Timesphere Minimalist Clock
posts.content: Add a contemporary and stylish touch to your home by hanging up the Timesphere minimalist clock. As the bright red ball makes its way around the dial to mark the time, it creates the eye-catching illusion that it is somehow defying gravity.

posts.title: Boba Fett Quotes Mosaic
posts.content: Immortalize your favorite bounty hunter in more ways than one with the Boba Fett quotes mosaic. This stylish art piece comes with an elegant built-in frame and displays a mosaic of the dreaded Boba Fett, made entirely from his limited set of lines.

posts.title: Unbreakable Sledge Hammer
posts.content: Whether you’re looking to do demolition work on your home, or want a reliable weapon for surviving the violent zombie apocalypse, the unbreakable sledge hammer will easily be the tool of choice. You’ll be a one man wrecking machine with this hammer on hand.

posts.title: Whiskey Wedge Cup
posts.content: Help take the edge off after a stressful day by chilling your drink with the whiskey wedge. The wedge’s stylish shape gives your drink an aesthetically pleasing look while its large size melts slower than smaller ice cubes to help retain your drink’s full flavor.

posts.title: Cocktastic Coloring Book
posts.content: Melt your cares away by getting lost in a big veiny triumphant bastard while coloring inside this Cocktastic coloring book. Each page depicts a different black and white illustration of a one-eyed monster that has been inspired by actual masterpieces.

posts.title: Roku Premiere 4K Streaming Device
posts.content: Cut the cord with your cable company once and for all and step into the future with the Roku Premiere 4K streaming device. This mighty device boasts a quad core processor, features a simple setup, and will give you access to 500,000+ movies and TV episodes.

posts.title: Six Person Floating Island
posts.content: Turn a day out on the water into paradise by heading out on the six person floating island. Once inflated, this comfy island provides spacious seating for six and comes with features like a removable sun shade and cup holders for added convenience.

posts.title: Cobblestone Forming Mold
posts.content: Create a storybook pathway in your garden or backyard with help from the cobblestone forming mold. This great DIY tool is great for all skill levels and easily makes 2′ x 2′ squares of cobblestone pathway in minutes so you can complete the path in a day or less!

posts.title: Dog Panda Costume
posts.content: Turn your four legged friend into the cutest looking panda in town by slipping him into this adorable dog costume. Intended for small breeds, it fits over your pooch’s two front legs – transforming him into an adorable and cuddly stuffed panda bear.

posts.title: Mirrored Touch Screen Drink Cooler
posts.content: Ensure you always have a cold beverage at hand by storing your supply in this mirrored touch screen drink cooler. It features a digital touch screen control panel for temperature adjustments and comes with interior LEDs so your drinks are always illuminated.

posts.title: Ultimate Snacks Variety Box
posts.content: Stock up your junk food pantry in a single shot by purchasing the ultimate snacks variety box. This massive package comes stuffed with all kinds of sugary and delicious treats like cookies, granola bars, chips, chocolates, and other candy.
